text:
No mention of Juneteenth
No mention of George Floyd
No mention of the 121,000 people who have died due to Coronavirus
No mention of healing the racial divide in this country
No mention of a single policy.

He has no plan.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: Juneteenth
entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
